input: Imagine a self-contained, hypothetical world with only the following conditions, and without any unmentioned factors or causal relationships: Tanning salon treatment has a direct effect on black hair. Going to the beach has a direct effect on black hair. The overall probability of tanning salon treatment is 92%. The probability of no tanning salon treatment and black hair is 6%. The probability of tanning salon treatment and black hair is 31%. Is the chance of black hair larger when observing tanning salon treatment?
